name: Unearthed Deep in the Mines of Estra
name_original: Unearthed Deep in the Mines of Estra
description:
Welcome to "Unearthed Deep in the Mines of Estra"! In this exciting mining adventure game, you'll step into the boots of a skilled miner and delve deep into the heart of the earth. Your task is to explore the mine and uncover the secrets that lay hidden within its depths.

Along the way, you'll fulfill contracts to mine precious resources, which you can use to upgrade your equipment and unlock new areas of the mine. But as you delve deeper, you'll discover that there's more to this mine than just valuable resources.
